presentation.v1: I started programming personal projects at eighteen. Currently studying a Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development, I also completed an online algorithmic programming course from Universidad Complutense de Madrid, and I provide freelance services and self-taught projects. I'm twenty-one years old and based in Spain (Castile and León, Valladolid).
presentation.v2: I can adapt to any language, I believe in the importance of documentation and development best practices.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description:
I have experience with languages and frameworks such as Rust, C++, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, TypeScript, Astro, React, Python, and game engines like Unreal Engine and Unity.
I have developed significant projects with each, gaining solid knowledge in software development.
experience.technologies:
I have also worked with tools such as MongoDB, Firebase, Vercel, Cloudflare, Tailwind, Node.js, virtual machines, Git, GitHub, and continuous integration using GitHub Actions.
Additionally, I have experience collaborating on team projects using Jira and Taiga.

jobs.title: Internship, Unreal Engine 5 Developer
jobs.description: During my internship, I worked on the development of a project using Unreal Engine focused on orbital physics simulation. I implemented the balance between centrifugal and centripetal forces, as well as the use of propellant to enable orbital transfers. Additionally, I created custom shaders and 3D models, integrating them into the simulation environment. It was an experience that allowed me to apply and expand my knowledge in programming, physics, and computer graphics.

jobs.title: Internship, New Technologies Technical Support
jobs.description: Full tech inventory restoration. Developed VBA scripts for equipment identification and registration to optimize data collection and organization. Collaborated on administrative tasks and technical support for IT asset management. Initiated efficiency improvements that enhanced inventory accuracy and processing times.

amanahacademia.name: Amanah Academia
amanahacademia.description: Spanish Academy, with social media, dashboard, newsletter, emails, payments, and bookings. Backend in Rust (Axum), Frontend in Astro (TypeScript).

olimpiadas-informaticas.name: Spanish Computer Science Olympiad
olimpiadas-informaticas.description: Online classes from UCM (Complutense University of Madrid) on competitive programming, with C++ and Java exercises.

elend-talk.name: Chat with PDF
elend-talk.description: Fluid conversation with Ollama and Deepseek about a user-provided PDF, with real-time chat history implementation and file upload, Astro and SvelteKit.

thefluentspanishhouse.name: The Fluent Spanish House
thefluentspanishhouse.description: English Academy, with social media, blog, dynamic content, emails, private class subscription and newsletter. Built with React Frontend and NodeJS Backend both in TypeScript.

octa-rust.name: OctaRust
octa-rust.description: Octa rust is an application to learn to play piano in a fun and entertaining way. Fully built with Rust.

bytes-colaborativos.name: BytesColaborativos
bytes-colaborativos.description: Java projects. With SpringBoot, Spring Security, JWT, documentation with Swagger and Javadoc, Kafka queues, etc., proposed by the BytesColaborativos community.
